data.name: Action_ExpressionNotDefined
data.value: The expression is not defined.

data.name: Action_TargetNotDefined
data.value: The target is not defined.

data.name: AggregationBelowGranularity1
data.value: Aggregations should not be created below the measure group's granularity attribute.

data.name: AggregationBelowGranularity2
data.value: Aggregations should not be created below the granularity attribute. This aggregation includes the '{0}' attribute which is below the measure group’s '{1}' granularity attribute.

data.name: AggregationDesignWithNoEstimatedRows1
data.value: Specify the EstimatedRows property for aggregation designs.

data.name: AggregationDesignWithNoEstimatedRows2
data.value: Specify the EstimatedRows property. It will be used by the user interface to validate and report on aggregation sizes.

data.name: AggregationDesign_NotUsedByAnyPartition1
data.value: Remove aggregation designs that are not used by any partitions.

data.name: AggregationDesign_NotUsedByAnyPartition2
data.value: Remove this aggregation design because it is not used by any partitions.

data.name: AggregationHasRelatedAttributes1
data.value: Do not include related attributes in the same aggregation.

data.name: AggregationHasRelatedAttributes2
data.value: The aggregation should not include both the '{0}' and '{1}' attributes, because there is a relationship from '{0}' to '{1}'.

data.name: AggregationsForTimeGranularityWithOnlySemiAdditiveMeasures
data.value: Include the granularity attribute of the time dimension in all the aggregations of measure groups with only semi-additive measures.

data.name: AggregationsForTimeGranularityWithSemiAdditiveMeasures
data.value: Include the granularity attribute of the time dimension in aggregation designs of measure groups with semi-additive measures, according to query patterns.

data.name: AttributeRelationshipName1
data.value: The names of attribute relationships should match the names of the related attributes.

data.name: AttributeRelationshipName2
data.value: The name specified for the attribute relationship differs from the name of the related attribute.

data.name: AttributeRelationshipNamedDescription
data.value: Avoid naming an attribute relationship "Description", this causes confusion when browsing the attribute properties.

data.name: AttributeRelationship_CreatesLoops
data.value: The relationship creates loop(s).

data.name: AttributeRelationship_RelationshipTypeCannotBeNoneForTheKey
data.value: The 'RelationshipType' property cannot be 'None' if the AttributeRelationship is on the key attribute.

data.name: AttributeTypeAccountOrTimeNeedsMatchingDimension1
data.value: Set 'Account' and 'Time' attribute types so that they are compatible with the dimension type.

data.name: AttributeTypeAccountOrTimeNeedsMatchingDimension2
data.value: The attribute type is set to '{0}', which is not compatible with the '{1}' dimension type.

data.name: AttributeTypeNeedsMatchingDimension1
data.value: Set attribute types so that they are compatible with the dimension type.

data.name: AttributeTypeNeedsMatchingDimension2
data.value: The attribute type is set to '{0}', which is not compatible with the '{1}' dimension type.

data.name: Attribute_AttributeRelationshipIsUnknown
data.value: Unknown attribute relationship with AttributeID = '{0}'.

data.name: Attribute_AttributeRelationshipsRequireAttributeHierarchyEnabled
data.value: Attribute hierarchy must be enabled if attribute relationships are used.

data.name: Attribute_BrowsableRelatedAttributesRequireIsAggregatable
data.value: An attribute relationship is not valid between an attribute whose IsAggregatable property is set to false and an attribute whose AttributeHierarchyEnabled property is set to true.

data.name: Attribute_DiscretizationMethod_ShouldBeNoneForWriteEnabledDimensions
data.value: The 'DiscretizationMethod' property should be 'None' for attributes in a write-enabled dimension.

data.name: Attribute_KeyColumn_InvalidColumn
data.value: The KeyColumn #{0} refers to '{2}', an unknown column, in the '{1}' table from the '{3}' DataSourceView.

data.name: Attribute_KeyColumn_InvalidSourceType
data.value: The KeyColumn #{0} has a Source of unaccepted type {1}.

data.name: Attribute_KeyColumn_InvalidTable
data.value: The KeyColumn #{0} refers to '{1}', an unknown table, in the '{2}' DataSourceView.

data.name: Attribute_KeyColumnsOfParentAttributeDoNotCorrespondToOnesOfKeyAttribute
data.value: Key columns of the '{0}' parent attribute do not correspond to key columns of the '{1}' dimension key attribute. These must be of the same quantity and type.

data.name: Attribute_KeyColumns_Empty
data.value: KeyColumns are not defined.

data.name: Attribute_KeyRequiresAttributeHierarchyEnabled
data.value: The key attribute requires attribute hierarchy enabled.

data.name: Attribute_LargeAttributeWithNonNumericKey
data.value: Use numeric key columns for attributes with {0} or more members.

data.name: Attribute_NameColumn_InvalidColumn
data.value: The NameColumn refers to an unknown column '{1}' in the '{0}' table in DataSourceView '{2}'.

data.name: Attribute_NameColumn_InvalidSourceType
data.value: The NameColumn has a Source of unaccepted type {0}.

data.name: Attribute_NameColumn_InvalidTable
data.value: The NameColumn refers to '{0}', an unknown table in the '{1}' DataSourceView.

data.name: Attribute_NotRelatedToTheKeyAttribute
data.value: The attribute is not related (directly or indirectly) to the '{0}' key attribute.

data.name: Attribute_OrderByAttribute_IsNotRelated
data.value: The attribute '{0}' used for ordering is not related to this attribute.

data.name: Attribute_OrderByAttribute_IsSelf
data.value: The attribute used for ordering cannot be self.

data.name: Attribute_OrderByAttribute_IsUnknown
data.value: The attribute used for ordering is unknown (OrderByAttributeID = '{0}').

data.name: Attribute_OrderBy_IsSetWithoutOrderByAttributeID
data.value: The ordering criteria is set to '{0}', but the ordering attribute is not set.

data.name: Attribute_ParentAttributeCannotHaveAttributeRelationships
data.value: A parent attribute can't have attribute relationships.

data.name: Attribute_ParentAttributeMustBeRelatedToTheKeyAttribute
data.value: A parent attribute must be related to the key attribute of the dimension.

data.name: Attribute_Type_ShouldBeDaysForTheKeyOfATimeDimension
data.value: The 'Type' property should be 'Days' for the key attribute of a time dimension.

data.name: AttributesTypesDontMatch1
data.value: Set attribute types so that they are compatible.

data.name: AttributesTypesDontMatch2
data.value: Two or more attributes in the dimension have incompatible attribute types.

data.name: BindingProperty_CannotCheckReference
data.value: Cannot check the existence of referenced '{1}' (specified by the property '{0}') because the parent '{2}' is null.

data.name: BindingProperty_InvalidType
data.value: The '{1}' type is not valid for the '{0}' property. Allowed types are: {2}.

data.name: BindingProperty_UnknownReference
data.value: The '{0}' property references unknown '{1}' with ID='{2}'.

data.name: BindingProperty_UnspecifiedReference
data.value: The '{0}' property doesn't specify the '{1}'.

data.name: CubeAttributeAggregationUsageWithUnaryOperatorOrCustomRollup1
data.value: Attributes with unary operators or custom rollups should have full aggregation usage.

data.name: CubeAttributeAggregationUsageWithUnaryOperatorOrCustomRollup2
data.value: The AggregationUsage property should be set to 'Full' because either the attribute or the parent attribute (if the dimension is parent-child) has unary operator or custom rollup defined.

data.name: CubeHasTooManyMeasureGroups1
data.value: Avoid having a large number of measure groups in a cube.

data.name: CubeHasTooManyMeasureGroups2
data.value: The cube contains a large number of measure groups. To improve performance, consider consolidating them into fewer measure groups or separating them into different cubes.

data.name: CubeWithSingleDimension
data.value: Avoid cubes with a single dimension.

data.name: Cube_CubeDimensionsWithExcludeDimensionNameAndDuplicateHierarchies
data.value: The cube dimensions, '{0}' and '{1}', do not have distinct hierarchy and attribute hierarchy names. The HierarchyUniqueNameStyle property for each of these cube dimensions is set to ExcludeDimensionName, but their hierarchy and attribute hierarchy names are not unique when the dimension names are excluded.

data.name: Cube_MultipleDefaultMdxScriptsDefined
data.value: There are multiple MdxScripts marked as default: {0}.

data.name: Cube_NoDefaultMdxScriptDefined
data.value: One MdxScript needs to be marked as default.

data.name: Cube_NoDimensionsDefined
data.value: No dimensions defined.

data.name: Cube_PerspectiveNotAllow
data.value: Perspectives are not allowed in this edition of Analysis Services.

data.name: DataItem_DataType_IsInvalid
data.value: The '{1}' data type is not allowed for the '{0}' property.

data.name: DataItem_DataType_IsUnexpected
data.value: The '{1}' data type is not allowed for the '{0}' property; '{2}' should be used.

data.name: DataItem_NullProcessing_UnknownMember
data.value: The '{0}' property has NullProcessing set to 'UnknownMember', but this is only allowed on KeyColumns of dimension attributes and measure group attributes and only if UnknownMember is Visible/Hidden.

data.name: DataItem_NullProcessing_UnknownMemberForKey
data.value: The '{0}' #{1} has NullProcessing set to 'UnknownMember', but the dimension doesn't have UnknownMember set to 'Visible' or 'Hidden'.

data.name: DataItem_Source_UndefinedColumn

data.name: DataItem_Source_UndefinedTable

data.name: DataItems_Source_InvalidType
data.value: A binding of type '{2}' cannot be used for the '{0}' property #{1}. The binding types allowed are: {3}.

data.value: The actual binding is not specified for the '{0}' property #{1}.

data.name: DataItems_Source_UndefinedColumn
data.value: The '{0}' #{1} doesn't define the column name.

data.name: DataItems_Source_UndefinedTable
data.value: The '{0}' #{1} doesn't define the table name.

data.name: DataMiningMeasureGroupDimension_CaseCubeDimensionIsInvalid
data.value: The case cube dimension is not valid or not specified.

data.name: DataMiningMeasureGroupDimension_CaseDimensionsShouldMatch
data.value: The case dimension should be the same dimension referenced by the key column of the mining model on which the source dimension is based.

data.name: DataMiningMeasureGroupDimension_CubeDimensionShouldBeDataMiningDimension
data.value: The referenced cube dimension '{0}' should be a data mining dimension.

data.name: DataSourceIsUnknown
data.value: The data source is unknown.

data.name: DataSourceView_DataSourceNotSpecified
data.value: The data source is not specified.

data.name: DatabasePermission_WriteCannotBeAllowed
data.value: A DatabasePermission cannot have Write=Allowed.

data.name: Database_AssemblyNotAllowed
data.value: CLR assemblies are not allowed in local cubes or mining models.

data.name: Database_TooManyDimensionsWithSingleAttribute
data.value: Avoid having multiple dimensions containing a single attribute. Consider unifying them if possible.

data.name: DiamondShapeRelationships1
data.value: Avoid diamond-shape relationships not covered by hierarchies.

data.name: DiamondShapeRelationships2
data.value: Design hierarchies for each incoming relationship path when attributes have multiple incoming relationships or, if any of the incoming relationships are unnecessary, you should delete them.

data.name: DimensionAndRelationshipTypes
data.value: Define attribute relationships as 'Rigid' where appropriate.

data.name: DimensionAttribute_IsNonAggregatableInParentChild
data.value: Avoid defining non-aggregatable attributes in a parent-child dimension with the exception of the parent attribute.

data.name: DimensionHasAttributeUsedByLevelsAndWithVisibleHierarchy
data.value: Avoid visible attribute hierarchies for attributes used as levels in user-defined hierarchies.

data.name: DimensionIgnoresDuplicateKeys
data.value: Do not ignore duplicate key errors. Change the KeyDuplicate property of the error configuration so that it is not set to IgnoreError.

data.name: DimensionPermission_AccessNoneRequiresAllAttributesAggregatable
data.value: All attributes should be aggregatable if Read and Write are 'None'.

data.name: DimensionPermission_WriteAccessRequiresNoAllowedOrDeniedSets
data.value: Write access requires no AllowedSet or DeniedSet to be specified for attribute permissions.

data.name: DimensionPermission_WriteAccessRequiresRead
data.value: Write access requires read; the 'Read' property should be set to 'Allowed'.

data.name: DimensionProcessByTable1
data.value: Avoid setting the 'ProcessingGroup' dimension property to 'ByTable'.

data.name: DimensionProcessByTable2
data.value: The 'ProcessingGroup' property of this dimension is set to 'ByTable'. In most cases, the default setting of 'ByAttribute' will achieve faster processing performance and better memory utilization.

data.name: DimensionTypeAccountOrTimeNeedsMatchingAttribute1
data.value: Set at least one of the attribute types to match the 'Account' or 'Time' dimension type.

data.name: DimensionTypeAccountOrTimeNeedsMatchingAttribute2
data.value: Set at least one of the attribute types to match the '{0}' dimension type.

data.name: DimensionTypeNeedsMatchingAttribute1
data.value: Set at least one of the attribute types to match the dimension type.

data.name: DimensionTypeNeedsMatchingAttribute2
data.value: Set at least one of the attribute types to match the '{0}' dimension type.

data.name: DimensionWithPollingQuery
data.value: For dimensions, do not use proactive caching with a polling query but no processing query.

data.name: Dimension_AttributesFormLoops
data.value: The dimension has attribute loop(s).

data.name: Dimension_DM_AttributeIsNotRelatedWithTheKey
data.value: The attribute is not related with the key attribute.

data.name: Dimension_DM_DataMiningDimensionRequiresAnAttributeWithID
data.value: An attribute with ID = '{0}' should be defined in a data mining dimension.

data.name: Dimension_DM_NodeUniqueNameAttributeIsNotKey
data.value: The attribute should be defined as key.

data.name: Dimension_DM_ParentUniqueNameAttributeIsNotParent
data.value: The attribute should be defined as parent.

data.name: Dimension_DependsOnDimensionIsUnknown
data.value: The DependsOnDimensionID property points to an unknown Dimension with the ID of '{0}'.

data.name: Dimension_HasMultipleNonAggregatableAttributes1
data.value: Avoid specifying more than one non-aggregatable attribute per dimension.

data.name: Dimension_HasMultipleNonAggregatableAttributes2
data.value: The dimension contains multiple non-aggregatable attributes: {0}. Consider having just one to avoid non-intuitive query results.

data.name: Dimension_HasUnknownMemberSetToHidden
data.value: Change the UnknownMember property of dimensions from Hidden to None.

data.name: Dimension_IsNotParentChildAndHasNoHierarchy
data.value: Create hierarchies in non-parent child dimensions.

data.name: Dimension_KeyAttributeOfParentChildShouldHaveHierarchyNotVisible
data.value: Set the AttributeHierarchyVisible property of the key attribute in a parent-child dimension to False.

data.name: Dimension_LinkedMeasureNotAllow
data.value: Linked dimensions are not allowed in this edition of Analysis Services.

data.name: Dimension_MultipleKeysDefined
data.value: There are multiple key attributes defined: {0}.

data.name: Dimension_MultipleParentsDefined
data.value: There are multiple parent attributes defined: {0}.

data.name: Dimension_NoAttributesDefined
data.value: No attributes are defined.

data.name: Dimension_NoHierarchiesDefined
data.value: No hierarchies are defined.

data.name: Dimension_NoKeyAttributeDefined
data.value: No key attribute is defined.

data.name: Dimension_RolapWithUnaryOperatorsOrCustomRollups
data.value: Avoid specifying ROLAP storage mode or enabling proactive caching with the OnlineMode property set to Immediate for dimensions containing either unary operators or custom rollups.

data.name: Dimension_WritebackNotAllow
data.value: Write-back is not allowed in this edition of Analysis Services.

data.name: Dimension_WritebackOnlyPossibleForStarSchemas
data.value: The dimension is write-enabled, but not all attribute bindings are in a single table (dimension writeback is only possible for star schemas).

data.name: Dimension_WritebackRequiresDataSourceViewBinding
data.value: The dimension source should be a DataSourceView, otherwise it cannot be write-enabled.

data.name: DistinctCountMeasure
data.value: Break distinct count measures into separate measure groups.

data.name: DotNetSqlClientProvider
data.value: For faster performance, use the Microsoft OLE DB Provider for SQL Server or the SQL Server Native Client provider to connect to a SQL Server data source instead of the .NET Data Provider for SQL Server (SqlClient).

data.name: Hierarchy_IsUnNatural1
data.value: Avoid creating hierarchies where attribute relationships do not exist between one or more levels.

data.name: Hierarchy_IsUnNatural2
data.value: Attribute relationships do not exist between one or more levels of this hierarchy. This may result in decreased query performance.

data.name: Hierarchy_LevelBasedOnAttributeMarkedAsParentMustNotBeInHierarchy
data.value: The source attribute of the level is marked as 'Parent'.

data.name: Hierarchy_ManyLevelsReuseTheSameAttribute
data.value: The following levels {0} re-use the same attribute '{1}'.

data.name: Hierarchy_NoLevelsDefined
data.value: No levels defined.

data.name: Hierarchy_NoneAggregatableLevelCantHaveLevelsAboveIt
data.value: The source attribute is marked as 'Not Aggregatable'. No levels based on 'Aggregatable' attributes should be above it.

data.name: IDIsMissing
data.value: The ID of the object is missing.

data.name: IndependentMeasureGroup1
data.value: Avoid defining measure groups with zero dimensional overlap.

data.name: IndependentMeasureGroup2
data.value: The measure group has zero dimensional overlap with all of the other measure groups in the cube. Consider moving it to a separate cube.

data.name: IntermediateGranularityNotAggregated1
data.value: The granularity attribute of the intermediate dimensions that are used to resolve many-to-many relationships should generally be included in several aggregations, according to query patterns.

data.name: IntermediateGranularityNotAggregated2
data.value: The '{1}' granularity attribute of the intermediate dimension '{0}' that is used to resolve many-to-many relationships should generally be included in several aggregations, according to query patterns.

data.name: Kpi_AssociatedMeasureGroupIsUnknown
data.value: Unknown associated measure group {0}.

data.name: Kpi_Value_Missing
data.value: The Value property is not specified.

data.name: LevelHasFewerMembersThanUpperLevel
data.value: Design hierarchies such that lower levels have more members than higher levels.

data.name: Level_ParentAttributeDoesntHaveAttributeHierarchyEnabled
data.value: The parent attribute doesn't have the attribute hierarchy enabled.

data.name: Level_SourceAttributeDoesntHaveAttributeHierarchyEnabled
data.value: The source attribute doesn't have the attribute hierarchy enabled.

data.name: Level_SourceAttributeIsUnknown
data.value: The source attribute is unknown or not specified.

data.name: Level_SourceAttributeOfParentChildLevelIsNotTheKeyAttribute
data.value: The source attribute for a parent-child level must be the key attribute of the dimension.

data.name: LinkedDimensionWithOutlineCalculations
data.value: Avoid creating linked dimensions to a source that contains UnaryOperatorColumns, CustomRollupColumns, or CustomRollupPropertiesColumns calculations.

data.name: ManyToManyHasLargeIntermediate
data.value: Avoid defining many-to-many relationships when either the intermediate measure group or any of the intermediate dimensions have 1 million or more rows.

data.name: ManyToManyMeasureGroupDimension_MeasureGroupIsSameAsParent
data.value: The intermediate measure group '{0}' is the same as the parent measure group.

data.name: ManyToManyMeasureGroupDimension_MeasureGroupShouldContainTheCubeDimension
data.value: The intermediate measure group '{1}' should contain the cube dimension '{0}'.

data.name: MdxScript_AnnotationsNotallowedOnCommand
data.value: Annotations are allowed on Script Command objects only for Tabular databases with CompatibilityLevel equal to 1103 or higher.

data.name: MdxScript_CommandHasNoText
data.value: Command #{0} has no text defined.

data.name: MdxScript_ThereAreOtherDefaultMdxScriptsInTheCube
data.value: There are other MdxScripts marked as default.

data.name: MeasureExpressionSKUError
data.value: The destination server is running a SQL Server edition that does not support measure expressions.

data.name: MeasureGroupAttribute_AParentAttributeCannotBeGranularity
data.value: An attribute with Usage = Parent cannot be a granularity attribute.

data.name: MeasureGroupAttribute_GranularityRequiresAttributeHierarchyEnabled
data.value: Granularity requires AttributeHierarchyEnabled to be true for CubeAttribute (if the CubeAttribute is explicitly included/defined in the cube, if not, on DimensionAttribute).

data.name: MeasureGroupAttribute_KeyColumnDataTypeDoesnMatch
data.value: The key column #{0} has data type '{1}' different than the attribute's key column data type '{2}'.

data.name: MeasureGroupAttribute_KeyColumnsCountDontMatch
data.value: Same count of key columns as in dimension attribute is required. This measure group attribute has {0} key columns, the dimension attribute has {1}.

data.name: MeasureGroupWithNoPartitions
data.value: Define partitions for measure groups.

data.name: MeasureGroupWithSemiAdditiveMeasuresAndRolapDimensions1
data.value: Dimensions that are related to measure groups that contain semi-additive measures should use MOLAP storage mode.

data.name: MeasureGroupWithSemiAdditiveMeasuresAndRolapDimensions2
data.value: The '{0}' dimension should use MOLAP storage mode because the measure group contains semi-additive measures. Also, if proactive caching is enabled you should verify that the OnlineMode property is set to OnCacheComplete.

data.name: MeasureGroup_AtMostTwoNonWritebackPartition
data.value: There can be at most two non-writeback partitions per measure group if you are using local cubes or the standard edition of Analysis Services.

data.name: MeasureGroup_ContainsRelationshipsParticipatingInLoops
data.value: The measure group '{0}' contains reference relationships forming loops.

data.name: MeasureGroup_CubeDimensionIsNotIncludedAsDegenerate
data.value: The cube dimension '{0}' is not included as a fact dimension in the measure group '{1}'. All fact dimensions in a measure group must be roles of the same database dimension and all roles of that database dimension in the cube must be included in the measure group as fact dimensions.

data.name: MeasureGroup_DegenerateDimensionsAreBasedOnDifferentDimensions
data.value: All fact dimensions in a measure group must be roles of the same database dimension.

data.name: MeasureGroup_HasLargePartitions
data.value: Split large partitions, with more than {0} million rows or that are over {1} MB in size, into smaller partitions to improve performance.

data.name: MeasureGroup_HasPartitionsToConsolidate
data.value: Consolidate partitions for measure groups with {0} or more partitions that have less than {1} million rows or are smaller than {2} MB in size.

data.name: MeasureGroup_HasTooManyAggregationDesigns
data.value: Limit the number of aggregation designs in a measure group to three.

data.name: MeasureGroup_LinkingToAnotherDatabaseNotAllowed
data.value: Linked measure groups outside the current database are not allowed in this edition of Analysis Services.

data.name: MeasureGroup_NoDimensionsDefined
data.value: No dimension relationships exist. The measure group '{0}' is not related to any dimensions.

data.name: MeasureGroup_NoMeasuresDefined
data.value: No measures are defined.

data.name: MeasureGroup_PartitionsWithSameSourceTableAndFilter
data.value: The following partitions have the same source table and filter: {0}.

data.name: MeasureGroup_SemiadditiveMeasureRequiresTimeDimension
data.value: Semi-additive measure requires a time dimension.

data.name: MeasureGroup_SourceIsSelf
data.value: The Source of a linked MeasureGroup cannot be self.

data.name: MeasureGroup_SourceMeasureGroupIsInTheSameCube
data.value: The Source is a MeasureGroup in the same cube, this scenario is not supported.

data.name: MeasureGroup_WriteEnabledWithNonSumOrUnsignedMeasures
data.value: A measure group with writeback partitions cannot have measures bound to unsigned columns or measures whose AggregateFunction property is set to other than Sum. Check the following partitions: {0}. Check the following measures: {1}.

data.name: MeasureGroupsWithTheSameDimensionalityAndGranularity1
data.value: Avoid creating measure groups that have the same dimensionality and granularity.

data.name: MeasureGroupsWithTheSameDimensionalityAndGranularity2
data.value: The '{0}' and '{1}' measure groups have the same dimensionality and granularity. Consider unifying them to improve performance.

data.name: Measure_AggregateFunctionNotAllow
data.value: The aggregate function '{0}' is not allowed in this edition of Analysis Services.

data.name: Measure_ByAccountRequiresAccountDimensionAndAttribute
data.value: A measure with 'ByAccount' aggregation function requires exactly one dimension with Type = 'Accounts' with exactly one attribute with Type = 'Account'. In addition, that attribute needs to be marked as parent if the dimension is parent-child.

data.name: Measure_DistinctCountRequiresNumericDataType
data.value: Distinct count measures require numeric data type (for the 'DataType' property).

data.name: Measure_Source_ValueNotSupportedForNullProcessing
data.value: '{0}' is not a supported value for the {1} property of a measure source.

data.name: MiningModelColumn_Columns_KeyNotDefined
data.value: A key column is not defined.

data.name: MiningModelColumn_NoFilterShouldBeDefinedBecauseSourceIsScalar
data.value: No row filter should be defined because the source column is ScalarMiningStructureColumn.

data.name: MiningModelColumn_NoNestedColumnShouldBeDefinedBecauseSourceIsScalar
data.value: No nested columns should be defined because the source column is ScalarMiningStructureColumn.

data.name: MiningModelColumn_UnexpectedType
data.value: An unexpected column of type '{0}' was supplied; the expected type is '{1}'.

data.name: MiningModel_ForeignKeyPresentMessage
data.value: The foreign key column {0} is used as an input or predictable column in the nested table {1}. This is highly discouraged.

data.name: MiningModel_KeyColumnNotDefined
data.value: A key column is not defined.

data.name: MiningModel_PluginAlgorithmNotAllowed
data.value: You attempted to use the third party algorithm '{0}'. Third party algorithms are not supported in this edition of Analysis Services.

data.name: MiningModel_PredictColumnNotDefined
data.value: A predictable column is not defined.

data.name: MiningStructureColumn_AttributeHierarchyNotEnabled
data.value: The '{0}' source cube attribute does not have its attribute hierarchy enabled.

data.name: MiningStructureColumn_Columns_KeyNotTextType
data.value: A key column containing a name column binding must be of type 'TEXT'.

data.name: MiningStructureColumn_ForeignKeyColumns_Count
data.value: The 'ForeignKeyColumns' should match the 'KeyColumns' of the key structure column '{0}'. Counts are different: there are {1} 'ForeignKeyColumns' defined and {2} 'KeyColumns'.

data.name: MiningStructureColumn_ForeignKeyColumns_DataType
data.value: The 'ForeignKeyColumns' should match the 'KeyColumns' of the key structure column '{0}'. The ForeignKeyColumn #{1} has DataType '{2}', different than the DataType '{3}' of the associated KeyColumn.

data.name: MiningStructureColumn_IncompatibleContentType
data.value: The content type '{0}' is not compatible with the discretized source dimension attribute.

data.name: MiningStructureColumn_KeyColumnIsBasedOnGuidDataColumn
data.value: A key column is based on the DataColumn [{0}].[{1}] of type GUID. This is not supported, create a named column where you cast the GUID to a string.

data.name: MiningStructureColumn_MultiPathsFromKeyColumnsTableToNameColumnTable
data.value: There are multiple paths (in the data source view) from the KeyColumns table '{0}' to the NameColumn table '{1}'. This ambiguity can generate wrong data when processing.

data.name: MiningStructureColumn_NoPathFromKeyColumnsTableToNameColumnTable
data.value: There is no path (in the data source view) from the KeyColumns table '{0}' to the NameColumn table '{1}'.

data.name: MiningStructureColumn_PropertyShouldNotBeDefinedInOlapMiningStructure
data.value: The '{0}' property should not be defined because the parent mining structure is not relational.

data.name: MiningStructureColumn_PropertyShouldNotBeDefinedInRelationalMiningStructure
data.value: The '{0}' property should not be defined because the parent mining structure is relational.

data.name: MiningStructureColumn_SourceCubeNeedsToBeTheSameAsForTheMiningStructure
data.value: The source cube needs to be the same as for the parent mining structure.

data.name: MiningStructureColumn_UnexpectedType
data.value: An unexpected column of type '{0}' was supplied; the expected type is '{1}'.

data.name: MiningStructureColumns_KeyColumnNotDefined
data.value: A key column is not defined.

data.name: MiningStructureColumns_MultiPathsFromKeyToColumn
data.value: There are multiple paths (in the data source view) from the case table '{0}' to the lookup table '{1}'. This ambiguity can generate wrong data when processing. Check the bindings for the MiningStructureColumn '{2}'.

data.name: MiningStructureColumns_MultipleKeyColumnsDefined
data.value: There are multiple key columns defined: {0}.

data.name: MiningStructureColumns_NoPathFromKeyToColumn
data.value: There is no path (in the data source view) from the case table '{0}' to the lookup table '{1}'. Check the bindings for the MiningStructureColumn '{2}'.

data.name: MiningStructure_ContentTypeNotSupportedMessage
data.value: Mining structure column {0} has content type of {1} that is not supported by Microsoft Association or Microsoft Naïve Bayes algorithms.

data.name: MiningStructure_KeyTimeInNestedTableNotDefined
data.value: You must mark one key column as Key Time for nested table column {0}.

data.name: MiningStructure_KeyTimeNotAllowed
data.value: Key Time key columns are not allowed because the mining structure contains one or more nested tables.

data.name: MiningStructure_KeyTimeNotDefined
data.value: A key column must be marked as Key Time.

data.name: MiningStructure_MultipleKeyNotAllowedInNestedTable
data.value: Only one key column is allowed for nested table column {0}.

data.name: MiningStructure_MultipleKeyTimeNotAllowed
data.value: Only one Key Time key column is allowed.

data.name: MiningStructure_NestedTableForeignKeyNotCaseKey
data.value: The foreign key column {1} for the nested table {0} is not specified as a key mining structure column at the case level.

data.name: NameColumnShouldBeDefinedIfMoreThanOneKeyColumnIsDefined
data.value: The NameColumn should be defined because there are multiple KeyColumns.

data.name: NameIsMissing
data.value: The Name of the object is missing.

data.name: NoTimeDimension1
data.value: Define a time dimension.

data.name: NoTimeDimension2
data.value: The database has no Time dimension. Consider creating one.

data.name: NonAggregatableAttributeNeedsDefaultMember
data.value: Define the default member for non-aggregatable attributes in either the DefaultMember property or the cubes' MDX script.

data.name: NonKeyLargeAttributeWithVisibleHierarchy
data.value: Either disable the attribute hierarchy or set the AttributeHierarchyOptimizedState property to NotOptimized for non-key attributes that have {0} or more members and a cardinality within {1}% of the key attribute.

data.name: ParentChildDimensionWithLargeKey
data.value: Avoid large parent-child dimensions that have {0} or members for the key attribute.

data.name: ParentIsMissing
data.value: Parent is missing. No other validations can be done.

data.name: ParentOfParticularTypeIsMissing
data.value: Parent {0} is missing. No other validations can be done.

data.name: ParentServerIsMissing
data.value: Parent server is missing. No validations can be done.

data.name: PartitionIsRemoteRolap
data.value: Avoid specifying ROLAP storage mode or enabling proactive caching with the OnlineMode property set to Immediate on remote partitions.

data.name: PartitionWithPollingQuery
data.value: For partitions, do not use proactive caching with a polling query but no processing query.

data.name: PartitionWithTooManyAggregations
data.value: Do not build more than {0} aggregations for a partition.

data.name: Partition_IsLargeWithNoAggs1
data.value: Design aggregations for partitions with {0} or more rows.

data.name: Partition_IsLargeWithNoAggs2
data.value: The partition has {0} or more estimated rows, but does not have any aggregations defined.

data.name: Partition_RemotePartitionNotAllowed
data.value: Remote partitions are not supported in this edition of Analysis Services.

data.name: Partition_RolapWithNoSlice
data.value: Set the Slice property on partitions with ROLAP storage mode or with proactive caching settings that allow entering ROLAP mode.

data.name: PerspectiveDefaultMeasureNotIncluded1
data.value: Include the default measure of a perspective in the perspective.

data.name: PerspectiveDefaultMeasureNotIncluded2
data.value: The '{0}' default measure, that was defined on the perspective or inherited from the cube, is not included in the perspective.

data.name: Perspective_NoDimensionsDefined
data.value: No dimensions defined.

data.name: ProactiveCaching_CanNotEnable
data.value: Proactive caching cannot be enabled in this edition of Analysis Services.

data.name: PropertiesCannotBeSpecifiedInTheSameTime
data.value: The properties '{0}' and '{1}' cannot be specified in the same time.

data.name: RedundantRelationship1
data.value: Avoid redundant attribute relationships because these relationships may prevent data from being aggregated when the granularity attribute of a cube is a non-key attribute.

data.name: RedundantRelationship2
data.value: This is a redundant attribute relationship and it should be deleted. A redundant attribute relationship may prevent data from being aggregated when a non-key attribute is used as a granularity attribute in a cube.

data.name: ReferenceIsInvalid
data.value: The reference to {0} is not valid: '{2}' = '{1}'.

data.name: ReferenceMeasureGroupDimension_ChainingRequiresMaterialization
data.value: The dimension should be materialized (set the 'Materialize' property to 'Regular') because the intermediate dimension '{0}' is also reference.

data.name: ReferenceMeasureGroupDimension_GranularityAttributeIsUnknown
data.value: The granularity attribute reference is unknown (GranularityAttributeID = '{0}').

data.name: ReferenceMeasureGroupDimension_GranularityAttribute_AttributeHierarchyShouldBeEnabled
data.value: The granularity attribute '{0}' should have 'AttributeHierarchyEnabled' set to 'true'.

data.name: ReferenceMeasureGroupDimension_IntermediateCubeDimensionIsUnknown
data.value: The intermediate cube dimension reference is unknown (IntermediateCubeDimensionID = '{0}').

data.name: ReferenceMeasureGroupDimension_IntermediateCubeDimensionShouldBeIncludedInMeasureGroup
data.value: The intermediate cube dimension '{0}' should be included in the measure group '{1}'.

data.name: ReferenceMeasureGroupDimension_IntermediateDimensionIsReferenced
data.value: The intermediate cube dimension '{0}' is a reference dimension in measure group '{1}', which is not supported.

data.name: ReferenceMeasureGroupDimension_IntermediateGranularityAttributeIsUnknown
data.value: The intermediate granularity attribute reference is unknown (IntermediateGranularityAttributeID = '{0}').

data.name: ReferenceMeasureGroupDimension_IntermediateGranularityAttribute_AttributeHierarchyShouldBeEnabled
data.value: The intermediate granularity attribute '{0}' should have 'AttributeHierarchyEnabled' set to 'true'.

data.name: ReferenceMeasureGroupDimension_IntermediateReferenceDimensionIsNotMaterialized
data.value: The intermediate dimension '{0}' is also included as reference in measure group '{1}' and should be materialized (set its 'Materialize' property to 'Regular').

data.name: ReferenceMeasureGroupDimension_KeyColumnsCountDontMatch
data.value: The granularity attribute and intermediate granularity attribute should have same number of key columns (the granularity has {0}, the intermediate granularity has {1}).

data.name: ReferenceMeasureGroupDimension_KeyColumnsDataTypesDontMatch
data.value: The granularity attribute has key column #{0} with data type '{1}' different than '{2}' from intermediate granularity attribute.

data.name: ReferenceMeasureGroupDimension_LoopDetected
data.value: The following cube dimensions form a loop through reference relationships for measure group '{1}': {0}.

data.name: ReferenceMeasureGroupDimension_MaterializedCannotHaveIntermediateTimeDimension
data.value: A reference dimension with Materialization = 'Regular' cannot have a server time dimension as its intermediate dimension.

data.name: ReferencedMeasureGroupDimensionNotMaterialized
data.value: Avoid non-materialized reference dimensions.

data.value: Granularity is not defined.

data.name: RegularMeasureGroupDimension_MultipleGranularitiesDefined
data.value: Multiple granularities defined. Only one is accepted and required.

data.name: TooManyParentChildDimsWithOutlineCalcs
